title: Textile, ca. 1919
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic threads
Technique: compound weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 76 x 90 cm (29 15/16 x 35 7/16 in.)
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Sheer black crepe ground with design in gold metallic. Long slender leaves turning alternately up and down in an all-over repeating pattern.
